Trade/Device Name(s): GlucoSure Voice Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GlucoSure Voice Blood Glucose Monitoring System with voice functionality and alternate site testing for quantitative glucose measurement.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, forearm, or palm for monitoring diabetes mellitus in lay users and healthcare professionals; meter includes voice functionality for visually impaired users.
